text:
Seu peito batia rápido, ela estava longe de sua sala e o sinal tocou e então ela correu.
Sua aula era de trigonometria, mas assim que ela cruzou a porta.
Seu mundo ficou em câmera lenta.
Alucinações eram um problema sério, e ela achava que estava tendo uma bem ali.
Era impossível....
Ela não podia acreditar....
Seu ar a engasgou...
Minha.
Rosalie estava ali sentada,.no fundo da sala, que imóvel quanto ela.
— Que bom que já está melhor, senhorita [redacted_name], poderia se sentar.
Disse o professor e olhou bem pra garota.
— Você está bem [redacted_name]?
— Não desculpa.
Foi isso que ela disse, antes de sair correndo da sala e pelo corredor da escola, ela esbarrou em alguém, um garoto loiro de olhos amarelhos.
Seu peito sufocou
Volte.
Cale a boca
Ela pediu desculpa e continuou correndo.
Ela nem viu quando chegou tão longe dentro da floresta.
trans:
Her chest was beating fast, she was far from her classroom and the bell rang, so she ran.
She had trigonometry class, but as soon as she crossed the door.
Her world went into slow motion.
Hallucinations were a serious problem, and she thought she was having one right there.
It was impossible...
She couldn't believe it...
Her breath choked her...
My.
Rosalie was sitting there, at the back of the room, as still as she was.
— I'm glad you're better already, Miss [redacted_name], you can have a sit.
Said the teacher, taking a good look at the girl.
— Are you alright, [redacted_name]?
— I'm not, sorry.
It was what she said before running out of the classroom, and down the school corridor, she bumped into someone, a blond boy with yellow eyes.
Her chest choked
Come back.
Shut up
She apologized and kept running.
She didn't even realize she had got so far into the forest.
